Name: Skywriter
About the game: In this puzzle game you control a plane and draw figures with a smoke trail. To progress you have to be precise, but to excel you also need to be fast and smart. There are 60 levels, can you get three stars on all of them? Pop the balloons for bonus credits and to increase your score. In free form creative mode your imagination is the only limit. Draw whatever you want! Use various smoke trails to make even more crazy drawings! Unlock new planes and paintjobs to customize them!
